properties.description: We open every Monday & Thursday morning from 10am-11.30am. A space for anyone over 18 who is lonely, isolated, or just wants to get out of the house. We are also dementia friendly. The kettle is always on, we have Wi-Fi as well as art, craft, board games, music knitting & crochet. Plenty of sofaâ€™s for a cuppa & a chat. We have disabled access via a lift & a disabled toilet. Give Heidi a call for further information on 07790 801686
